labs.title: Lab 100: Exploring ICS
labs.description: This lab will expose you to the functionality in ICS.

labs.title: Lab 200: Basic ICS Development
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to build a 'hello world' echo service.

labs.title: Lab 300: Database Integration
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to develop an integration into an on-premesis backend database system using an ICS orchestration.

labs.title: Lab 400: EBS Integration
labs.description: In this Lab we are going to create an integration into an on-premesis backend EBS system using an ICS orchestration.
